definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: Whenever I see z, well, I want to get rid of it.
sentences.chinese: 但看到z时，我们需要消去它。

sentences.english: R So let's get rid of R in this expression here.
sentences.chinese: 利用这个式子，我们就可以消去。

sentences.english: As the bubble deflates, China's exports are normalizing.
sentences.chinese: 当泡沫消去，中国的出口亦回归正常化。

sentences.english: That's going to get rid of this minus 1 here.
sentences.chinese: 这样就消去了幂次中的。

sentences.english: y We're going to use x and y. We're going to get rid of z.
This time, the T dS terms are going to cancel.
In Chapter 1, we investigate the cancellative monoids.
sentences.chinese: 第一章，主要研究消去幺半群。

sentences.english: Cold idea expunction, the frost and snow disappears.
So this is going to turn out to be a relatively simple case, because the factorials are going to cancel.
sentences.chinese: 这样将产生一个相对简单的结果，因为阶乘被消去了。

sentences.chinese: 当泡沫消去，中国的出口亦回归正常化。

sentences.english: In order to el-eminate the nonlinearity of the system model, the technique of direct feedback linearization (DFL) is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 为消去系统非线性，引入了直接反馈线性化技术。

sentences.english: Usually after finishing exercise the craving will have passed.
sentences.chinese: 通常，完成练习之后，你的渴望就会消去。

sentences.english: I'm taking my ex-girlfriend of my speed dialer .
sentences.chinese: 我正在消去我前女友的快速拨号。

sentences.english: We'll substitute that in, and the T dS terms are going to cancel.
In Chapter 1, we investigate the cancellation monoids.
sentences.chinese: 第一章，主要研究消去幺半群。

sentences.english: On the condition of large detuning, the excited state would be eliminated adiabaticly.
sentences.chinese: 在大失谐的条件下，激发态被绝热消去。

definition: (literary) to eliminate/to put an end to
to vanish like smoke in thin air/to disappear
to pacify/to calm down/to be cured/to be healed
to melt like ice and break like tiles/to disintegrate/to dissolve
